content: hooded dog cape crochet pattern by sara sach please add this pattern to your ravelry favorites we have just retested and updated this crochet pattern and added 2 more sizes free pattern link https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2019/01/hooded-cape-for-small-dogs-crochet html skill easy materials crochet hook - h/ 5 00 mm yarn - worsted weight 4 2 to 4 oz depending on size yarn needle tape measure stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet v_stitch vs size 3 sizes xxs xs s for dogs 2- 15 lbs these sizes are approximates as all dog s are shaped different xxs - 2 -5 lb dogs xs 6 - 10 lb dogs s 11-15 lb dogs please do not copy or redistribute this pattern
